entry.title: [GRA/BHS][Web Hosting] - TLS Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 2, 10:24 UTC  -  May 16, 10:24 UTC

Apr 25, 11:16 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Apr 24, 23:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 10:24 UTC
End time : 16/05/2023 10:24 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our product security management for you and your visitors, we will remove TLS versions 1.0 and TLS 1.1 from our web hosting and CDN services. This will leave only TLS 1.2 and TLS 1.3 versions active, which have been deemed compliant by CNIL in terms of data security.
No action is required from you â€” neither on your Web Hosting plan, nor on your CDN.
We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

End time : 24/04/2023 19:00 UTC

entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Web Hosting] - OVHcloud Web Statistics
entry.content:
Apr 24, 15:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 17, 22:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 24/04/2023 15:00 UTC
End time : 24/07/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our product lifecycle management, we have decided to end the access of its predecessor: Urchin statistics collection service. It won't be available from Monday 24 april 2023.
Since 2021, we have made available our new tool to display your website statistics, called OVHcloud Web Statistics which can be accessed with your hosting logs.
Documentation about OVHcloud Web Statistics: https://docs.ovh.com/us/en/hosting/shared_view_my_websites_logs_and_statistics/ .

Please note that this maintenance only covers Webhosting statistics before February 2020.
Statistics after February 2020 are available in Owstats.
Logs collection and Daily statistics aren't in the scope of the maintenance.

Timeline :
Monday 24 April 2023: Closing of the service accessibility
Monday 24 April 2023: End of Support, Shutdown of the service
Monday 24 July 2023: Data deletion


We will update this task during the proposed timeline.
